name: STELLA Living Labs
description: The DFG-funded STELLA project aims to create an evaluation infrastructure that allows to evaluate search and recommendation services within productive web-based search systems with real users.
keywords: Evaluation framework, A/B testing, Interlinking, Information Retrieval, Recommendation System

parentOrganization.name: GESIS - Leibniz-Institut für Sozialwissenschaften
parentOrganization.alternateName: GESIS - Leibniz Institut for the Social Sciences

parentOrganization.name: Technische Hochschule Köln
parentOrganization.alternateName: TH Köln - University of Applied Sciences

parentOrganization.name: Deutsche Zentralbibliothek für Medizin (ZB MED) - Informationszentrum Lebenswissenschaften
parentOrganization.alternateName: ZB MED Information Centre for Life Sciences

funding.description: Project no. 407518790 (corresponding to the STELLA project)
